UsageException  
WrapperException Wraps and converts non RuntimeExceptions to RuntimeException s In addition, it is capable of adding the supplied message to the wrapped exception.
 

Package gravity Description

This package contains the core gravity API. This package contains the client interface classes. It also defines interfaces that clients can implement to override the default behavior of the framework.

Gravity is the main client interface class to initialize the framework and obtain the registry. The registry can also be obtained, after initialization, via the Registry class.
